podi kossakata thiyenne chandrikawe kes ekaya.podi kumaraya kiwwa widihata eeka yawwe ohuya.ee unata thissa lokka kiyanne ehew ekak yawwe na kiyalaya.ee unata ee chandrikawe prathilabha bukthi windina janathawak widihata thissa lokka irisiyawata kiyana dewal api ganan ganne natha.chandrikawa nisa ape jiwitha sukhitha muditha unu hati, aswanu saru wi atukotu piri rata bathin bulathin sara wu hati danne apiya.oya kiyana thissa lokka methuwak kalayakata aduma gane ahas gunduwakwath yawa nathi baw apita budu shuwar ya.eki hinamanayen ape rate chandrikawa kiya ekak nomathi baw kiyana me thatta nakiyata kiyannata aththe dura daknayak gena rata ahasa nirikshanaya karana lesaya.ewita oonama gon thadiyekuta ape abhimanawath chandrikawath ehi sitina wirodhara sinhaya ragath ape jathika kodiyath eyata yatin nil pahayen liya athi "subha anagathayak" yannath dakimata hakiwanu atha.
